title: Atomic Habits
content: This book is a powerful guide to breaking bad routines and building lasting good habits through small, consistent changes.

title: 48 Laws of Power
content: This book is a bestselling book by Robert Greene that provides a guide to understanding and mastering power dynamics in various aspects of life.

title: Think and Grow rich
content: this book is a classic self-help book by Napoleon hill. It is based on Hill's research of wealthy and successful individials, including figures like Andrew Carnegie and Henry Ford.
